block.para: Shows how to manipulate &S3long; (&S3;) versioned objects in batches by creating jobs that call &LAMlong; functions to perform processing. This example creates a version-enabled bucket, uploads the stanzas from the poem You Are Old, Father William by Lewis Carroll, and uses &S3; batch jobs to twist the poem in various ways.

listitem.para: Create &LAM; functions that operate on versioned objects.
Create a manifest of objects to update.
Create batch jobs that invoke &LAM; functions to update objects.
Empty and delete a versioned bucket.

block.para: This example is best viewed on GitHub. For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
